stimulusHtml:
Source: World Bank, 2010


Based on your knowledge of comparative government and politics and the table above, which of the following statements is accurate?
choicesHtml: Current or former communist states have more women in national parliaments than do states that have not experienced communism.
States in which a majority of the population practices a single religion have fewer women in national parliaments than do states with greater religious diversity.
There is little correlation between the level of democratization and the proportion of women serving in national parliaments.
States with proportional representation have more women in national parliaments than do states with single member districts.
Unitary states have more women in national parliaments than do federal states.
